author: jdcasey
msg: Added a stack of lifecycle fork-points that will be removed from each successively deeper level of forking in a cumulative manner, to prevent multi-node cycles in addition to simply blocking two-node cycles.
The basic problem with the recursion check that was in there was a type mismatch on the contents of a java.util.List. It's fixed now.
